scripts.api:extract:deps: api-extractor run --local --config ./scripts/api-extractor/grpc-js.json && node ./scripts/rename-grpc-json.js && mkdir -p temp/combined && cp -f temp/ts-cli-plugin.api.json temp/combined/ && cp -f temp/@grpc/grpc-js.api.json temp/combined/
scripts.build: pnpm compile:ts && pnpm api:extract && pnpm api:extract:deps && pnpm compile:docs
scripts.clean: rimraf dist docs etc/* temp/combined temp/@grpc/grpc-js.api.json
scripts.copy-assets: cp -R src/protos dist/protos 2>/dev/null || true && pnpm fix:format
scripts.lint:all: pnpm lint:eslint && pnpm lint:typecheck && pnpm lint:format
scripts.rebuild: pnpm clean && pnpm build && pnpm build
